mapper.sql: trid, eid, positionnum, measurevalue, measuror, measuretime, ttype, tstate, tnote, tremark1, tremark2, equipPositionNum, equipName
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM IOT_EQUIPMENT_THICK WHERE EID = #{eid}
mapper.sql: tid, eid, positionnum, measuretype, pointnum, cycle, cycleunit, tname, nextmeasuretime, filepath, creator, createtime, tremark1, tremark2, equMemoOne, equCommissionDate, equProducDate, material, equModel, meduimType, welName
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
INSERT INTO IOT_EQUIPMENT_THICK ( TID, EID, POSITIONNUM, MEASURETYPE, TNAME, POINTNUM, CYCLE, CYCLEUNIT, NEXTMEASURETIME, FILEPATH, CREATOR, CREATETIME, TREMARK1, TREMARK2 ) VALUES ( #{tid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measuretype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pointnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cycle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycleunit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextmeasuretime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{tremark1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tremark2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
